subject: Wages and Salaries
Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The agents for Robinson Cano had a meeting on Tuesday with team officials in Manhattan to continue negotiations on a new contract, but a gulf of more than $100 million was said to remain.
snippet: The agents for Robinson Cano had a meeting on Tuesday with team officials in Manhattan to continue negotiations on a new contract, but a gulf of more than $100 million was said to remain.
